## A small wrapper TypeScript wrapper of Bluebird

### Requirements
- TypeScript v2.0.0+

### Installation
```
npm install bluebird-ts --save
```

### Consumption
```ts
import * as R from 'bluebird-ts';
```

### Reference
The types originate from [types/npm-bluebird](https://github.com/types/npm-bluebird)
